item.description:
Hello Everybody,

Let’s get our semi-monthly evening language exchange started again. This week we're back at the Clear Conscience Café in Central Sq.

We will practice daily conversation in Mandarin. We may have Language Exchange in small groups if there are more than 10 people sign up.

Food and beverage are available. Please consider supporting this local business with a small purchase as a thank you for allowing us to use the space. This is not required, just nice.

ALL LEVELS WELCOME!!! Feel free to bring books, course work, or anything you want to share with the group.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Evening Chinese/English Language Exchange Group (6:15pm-8pm)
